thread.title: Amy Simpson Brimmer
thread.title_full: ZipRecruiter reviewed by Amy Simpson Brimmer

author: Amy Simpson Brimmer
title: Amy Simpson Brimmer
text:
Loved the efficient, knowledgeable service Michael Waterman provided.
The only drawback to using this job board as an employer is that you can do EVERYTHING online EXCEPT suspend or cancel a subscription. Also, with erratic recruitment needs, it's not convenient to deal with a month-to-month subscription for my position as an employer.
